load a single ﬁle. We can use the read csv() Pandas function to load a single data ﬁle and
specify that the ﬁle has no header and to separate columns using white space.
# load a csv file as a dataframe
dataframe = read_csv(filepath, header=None, delim_whitespace=True)
Listing 22.1: Example of loading a ﬁle as a DataFrame.
We can wrap this in a function named load file(). The complete example of this function
is listed below.
# load one file from the har dataset
from pandas import read_csv
